body: Gaining rep here is much easier than reddit. For one, there aren't nearly as many posters, so you have a lot less competition. If it's quality you're pretty much guaranteed to have a lot of upvotes. The other reason is that rep is simply the sum of upvotes and downvotes, while on reddit it's logarithmic and the more upvotes a post has the more upvotes it takes to get a karma.
body_html: Gaining rep here is much easier than reddit. For one, there aren't nearly as many posters, so you have a lot less competition. If it's quality you're pretty much guaranteed to have a lot of upvotes. The other reason is that rep is simply the sum of upvotes and downvotes, while on reddit it's logarithmic and the more upvotes a post has the more upvotes it takes to get a karma.

body:
I want to make a subreddit about gender non-conformity in general. On reddit there was never a subreddit specifically dedicated to the purpose. And the one's that existed concerning gender were often oversexualized. Like a place where people expressing non heteronormative tendencies can discuss their hobbies, styles, post selfies/memes, etc to express themselves and receive support. Some kind of comrodary to share rough experiences. Especially for men, because men have some pretty extreme social pressure placed on them in this regard. But I want it to welcome women too. 

Your idea sounds pretty fun. I love taking those stupid online tests. Even if their actual value is dubious sometimes lol
body_html:
I want to make a subreddit about gender non-conformity in general. On reddit there was never a subreddit specifically dedicated to the purpose. And the one's that existed concerning gender were often oversexualized. Like a place where people expressing non heteronormative tendencies can discuss their hobbies, styles, post selfies/memes, etc to express themselves and receive support. Some kind of comrodary to share rough experiences. Especially for men, because men have some pretty extreme social pressure placed on them in this regard. But I want it to welcome women too.

Your idea sounds pretty fun. I love taking those stupid online tests. Even if their actual value is dubious sometimes lol

body:
Honestly, I love the limitation. Prevents spam and throwaway accounts from being so successful in trolling or hijacking stuff.

Just need to participate. Lots of comments. Check out the Trending feed in the top left of the page and engage with communities. There are a ton of them already.
body_html:
Honestly, I love the limitation. Prevents spam and throwaway accounts from being so successful in trolling or hijacking stuff.

Just need to participate. Lots of comments. Check out the Trending feed in the top left of the page and engage with communities. There are a ton of them already.
